2186.verse: ٱلْمَالُ|The wealth|94|100|10814$وَٱلْبَنُونَ|and children|100|112|10815$زِينَةُ|(are) adornment|128|140|10816$ٱلْحَيَوٲةِ|(of) the life|96|108|817$ٱلدُّنْيَا‌ۖ|(of) the world.|117|129|818$وَٱلْبَـٰقِيَـٰتُ|But the enduring|130|136|10817$ٱلصَّـٰلِحَـٰتُ|good deeds|122|140|10818$خَيْرٌ|(are) better|99|134|520$عِندَ|near|56|91|521$رَبِّكَ|your Lord|82|117|1322$ثَوَابًا|(for) reward|100|135|3641$وَخَيْرٌ|and better|90|108|10808$أَمَلاً|(for) hope.|92|92|10819$

2187.verse: وَيَوْمَ|And the Day|102|116|819$نُسَيِّرُ|We will cause (to) move|181|208|10820$ٱلْجِبَالَ|the mountains|114|142|6550$وَتَرَى|and you will see|126|154|5095$ٱلْأَرْضَ|the earth|92|106|197$بَارِزَةً|(as) a leveled plain|146|157|10821$وَحَشَرْنَـٰهُمْ|and We will gather them|181|202|10822$فَلَمْ|and not|71|92|4026$نُغَادِرْ|We will leave behind|154|176|10823$مِنْهُمْ|from them|87|98|730$أَحَدًا|anyone.|73|73|4849$

2188.verse: وَعُرِضُواْ|And they will be presented|197|223|10824$عَلَىٰ|before|63|116|52$رَبِّكَ|your Lord|82|135|1322$صَفًّا|(in) rows,|84|137|10825$لَّقَدْ|"Certainly,|88|114|3466$جِئْتُمُونَا|you have come to Us|161|170|5844$كَمَا|as|53|71|110$خَلَقْنَـٰكُمْ|We created you|126|144|5846$أَوَّلَ|the first|73|91|428$مَرَّةِۭ‌ۚ|time.|58|76|5847$بَلْ|Nay,|50|68|848$زَعَمْتُمْ|you claimed|98|107|5852$أَلَّن|that not|75|128|10826$نَّجْعَلَ|We made|81|187|10827$لَكُم|for you|67|173|207$مَّوْعِدًا|an appointment."|133|186|10828$

2189.verse: وَوُضِعَ|And (will) be placed|151|159|10829$ٱلْكِتَـٰبُ|the Book|85|102|29$فَتَرَى|and you will see|126|143|5040$ٱلْمُجْرِمِينَ|the criminals|118|135|5641$مُشْفِقِينَ|fearful|91|108|10830$مِمَّا|of what|71|79|216$فِيهِ|(is) in it,|77|84|32$وَيَقُولُونَ|and they will say,|137|151|3019$يَـٰوَيْلَتَنَا|"Oh, woe to us!|124|138|10831$مَالِ|What (is) for|105|119|10832$هَـٰذَا|this|59|73|248$ٱلْكِتَـٰبِ|[the] Book,|95|109|811$لَا|not|42|49|30$يُغَادِرُ|leaves|75|94|10833$صَغِيرَةً|a small|93|132|7977$وَلَا|and not|71|110|25$كَبِيرَةً|a great|74|113|7978$إِلَّآ|except|65|104|86$أَحْصَـٰهَا‌ۚ|has enumerated it?"|152|172|10834$وَوَجَدُواْ|And they will find|134|142|10835$مَا|what|53|70|262$عَمِلُواْ|they did|78|95|6052$حَاضِرًا‌ۗ|presented.|94|111|10836$وَلَا|And not|72|89|25$يَظْلِمُ|deals unjustly|111|128|4001$رَبُّكَ|your Lord|82|90|310$أَحَدًا|(with) anyone.|118|118|4849$

2190.verse: وَإِذْ|And when|85|98|308$قُلْنَا|We said|72|98|356$لِلْمَلَـٰٓئِكَةِ|to the Angels,|114|140|311$ٱسْجُدُواْ|"Prostrate|93|119|357$لِأَدَمَ|to Adam,"|85|111|358$فَسَجَدُوٓاْ|so they prostrated|144|157|359$إِلَّآ|except|65|71|86$إِبْلِيسَ|Iblis.|76|87|360$كَانَ|(He) was|80|91|913$مِنَ|of|50|61|156$ٱلْجِنِّ|the jinn,|75|86|6030$فَفَسَقَ|and he rebelled|121|132|10837$عَنْ|against|68|79|1105$أَمْرِ|the Command|110|116|10521$رَبِّهِۦٓ‌ۗ|(of) his Lord.|106|116|392$أَفَتَتَّخِذُونَهُۥ|Will you then take him|167|188|10838$وَذُرِّيَّتَهُۥٓ|and his offspring|129|150|10839$أَوْلِيَآءَ|(as) protectors|121|142|2754$مِن دُونِى|other than Me,|119|129|10215$وَهُمْ|while they|88|116|256$لَكُمْ|(are) to you|101|158|207$عَدُوُّۢ‌ۚ|enemies?|80|136|386$بِئْسَ|Wretched|84|140|8726$لِلظَّـٰلِمِينَ|for the wrongdoers|146|174|2438$بَدَلاً|(is) the exchange.|142|142|10840$

2191.verse: ۞ مَّآ|Not|84|91|10841$أَشْهَدتُّهُمْ|I made them witness|158|172|10842$خَلْقَ|the creation|101|115|4477$ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٲتِ|(of) the heavens|132|146|351$وَٱلْأَرْضِ|and the earth|111|125|352$وَلَا|and not|71|78|25$خَلْقَ|the creation|101|113|4477$أَنفُسِهِمْ|(of) themselves|124|149|1025$وَمَا|and not|71|96|46$كُنتُ|I Am|64|89|4182$مُتَّخِذَ|the One to take|126|151|10843$ٱلْمُضِلِّينَ|the misleaders|115|127|10844$عَضُدًا|(as) helper(s).|116|116|10845$

2192.verse: وَيَوْمَ|And the Day|102|118|819$يَقُولُ|He will say,|95|127|77$نَادُواْ|"Call|67|99|10846$شُرَكَآءِىَ|My partners,|106|138|9940$ٱلَّذِينَ|those who|89|121|20$زَعَمْتُمْ|you claimed,"|108|124|5852$فَدَعَوْهُمْ|then they will call them|175|192|10847$فَلَمْ|but not|69|103|4026$يَسْتَجِيبُواْ|they will respond|132|166|8404$لَهُمْ|to them.|77|111|98$وَجَعَلْنَا|And We will make|135|152|4805$بَيْنَهُم|between them|115|355|1056$مَّوْبِقًا|a barrier.|80|320|10848$

2186.verse: Wealth and children are [but] adornment of the worldly life. But the enduring good deeds are better to your Lord for reward and better for [one's] hope.

2187.verse: And [warn of] the Day when We will remove the mountains and you will see the earth prominent, and We will gather them and not leave behind from them anyone.

2188.verse: And they will be presented before your Lord in rows, [and He will say], "You have certainly come to Us just as We created you the first time. But you claimed that We would never make for you an appointment."

2189.verse: And the record [of deeds] will be placed [open], and you will see the criminals fearful of that within it, and they will say, "Oh, woe to us! What is this book that leaves nothing small or great except that it has enumerated it?" And they will find what they did present [before them]. And your Lord does injustice to no one.

2190.verse: And [mention] when We said to the angels, "Prostrate to Adam," and they prostrated, except for Iblees. He was of the jinn and departed from the command of his Lord. Then will you take him and his descendants as allies other than Me while they are enemies to you? Wretched it is for the wrongdoers as an exchange.

2191.verse: I did not make them witness to the creation of the heavens and the earth or to the creation of themselves, and I would not have taken the misguiders as assistants.

2192.verse: And [warn of] the Day when He will say, "Call 'My partners' whom you claimed," and they will invoke them, but they will not respond to them. And We will put between them [a valley of] destruction.

2193.verse: And the criminals will see the Fire and will be certain that they are to fall therein. And they will not find from it a way elsewhere.
